question: You will receive an invoice from your supplier for a material amounting to €1,000 per 100 pieces. After entering the header data and the order number, the system suggests an invoice amount of €700 and the quantity of 70 pieces from the goods receipt booking. How can you enter the invoice without invoice blocking?
instruction: There are 2 correct answers to this question.

options.A: Before you post the invoice, change the "Invoice Block" indicator in the invoice header to "Manually released for payment".
options.B: Before posting, you define a tolerance group in your user role whose threshold value is not exceeded by the existing deviation. If you do not have the appropriate permission, you must have your system administrator make this role change.
options.C: You switch to "Park incoming invoice" and save the invoice.
options.D: You use manual invoice reduction. Select the "Supplier Error: Reduce Quantity" option and enter the quantity and value on the invoice next to the suggested quantity and value.
